segments.text: I'd like to pay my bill now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your name and room number , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you used any hotel services this morning ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . You have stayed for four nights at 90 US dollars each , and here are the meals that you had at the hotel . That makes a total of 660 US dollars .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I pay by credit card ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . Please sign your name here .
segments.speaker: S2
